FactorAggregator.mainSelect: SELECT c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 c.cpod, --1 a.operando, --2 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,c.d_valido_dal,data_validita) AS ab ,--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,c.d_valido_dal,c.d_valido_al,data_validita_al) AS bis ,--4 CASE WHEN A.OPERANDO='EF_RES' THEN DEC_CTFOR(C.CTFOR) WHEN a.operando='EF_SC_APP' THEN prezzo ELSE valori END CASE, --5 NVL(prezzo,0) , --6 b.id_operando, --7 DEC_CTFOR(C.CTFOR) FROM z_prodotto_operando a, z_anagrafica_operandi b, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele C , DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d WHERE a.acquisizione= c.cfreq AND d.dbi_punto_key= c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR --AND c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR = 'PR2267551' AND a.ctar1=c.ctar1 AND c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN ( SELECT cncon FROM z_test_contratti) -- WHERE -- note = 'lotto 31') AND a.operando = b.operando AND a.operando != 'EF_SC_APP' AND tipo = 'FACTOR' AND c.d_valido_dal=d.valid_from AND c.d_valido_al=d.valid_until AND Get_Bis2(a.Operando,a.Ctar1,c.cdsti,c.cdces,Data_Validita_Al) > '20080401' GROUP BY c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, c.cpod, a.operando, prezzo, --GET_AB_ESQP_01_FT(b.operando,a.ctar1,c.d_valido_dal,data_validita), get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,c.d_valido_dal,data_validita) ,--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,c.d_valido_dal,c.d_valido_al, data_validita_al),--4 --get_bis3(b.operando,a.ctar1,c.d_valido_dal,c.d_valido_al, data_validita_al), valori, c.d_valido_dal, NVL(prezzo,0), b.id_operando , DEC_CTFOR(C.CTFOR) UNION ALL SELECT c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 c.cpod, --1 a.operando, --2 CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(cdsti,'YYYYMMDD') >= NVL(GET_AB_ESQP_01_FT(b.operando,c.ctar1, x.min_cdsti, data_validita, c.cdces, c.d_valido_dal),'99991231') THEN TO_CHAR(cdsti,'YYYYMMDD') ELSE NVL(GET_AB_ESQP_01_FT(b.operando,c.ctar1,x.min_cdsti,data_validita, c.cdces, c.d_valido_dal),'99991231') END AS ab, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(cdces,'YYYYMMDD') <= get_bis3(b.operando,c.ctar1,x.min_cdsti, c.d_valido_al, data_validita_al) THEN TO_CHAR(cdces,'YYYYMMDD') ELSE get_bis3(b.operando,c.ctar1,x.min_cdsti,c.d_valido_al,data_validita_al) END AS bis,--4 CASE WHEN A.OPERANDO='EF_RES' THEN DEC_CTFOR(C.CTFOR) WHEN a.operando='EF_SC_APP' THEN prezzo ELSE valori END CASE, --5 NVL(prezzo,0) , --6 b.id_operando, --7 DEC_CTFOR(C.CTFOR) FROM z_prodotto_operando a, z_anagrafica_operandi b, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele C , DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d, ( SELECT MIN(c.d_valido_dal) AS min_cdsti, c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR FROM DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele C GROUP BY c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR) x WHERE a.acquisizione= c.cfreq AND d.dbi_punto_key= c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR AND c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR = x.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR --AND c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR = 'PR2267551' AND a.ctar1=c.ctar1 AND c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN ( SELECT cncon FROM z_test_contratti where note = 'lotto 40') AND a.operando = b.operando AND a.operando = 'EF_SC_APP' AND tipo = 'FACTOR' AND c.d_valido_dal=d.valid_from AND c.d_valido_al=d.valid_until AND ( CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(cdces,'YYYYMMDD') <= get_bis3(b.operando,c.ctar1, x.min_cdsti, c.d_valido_al, data_validita_al) THEN TO_CHAR(cdces,'YYYYMMDD') ELSE get_bis3(b.operando,c.ctar1,x.min_cdsti,c.d_valido_al, data_validita_al) END) > '20080401' AND TO_CHAR(cdsti,'YYYYMMDD') <= get_bis3(b.operando,c.ctar1,x.min_cdsti, c.d_valido_al, data_validita_al) --bis AND NVL(GET_AB_ESQP_01_FT(b.operando,c.ctar1,x.min_cdsti,data_validita, c.cdces, c.d_valido_dal), '99991231') <= TO_CHAR(cdces,'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY c.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, c.cpod, a.operando, prezzo, NVL(GET_AB_ESQP_01_FT(b.operando,c.ctar1,x.min_cdsti,data_validita, c.cdces, c.d_valido_dal), '99991231'), get_bis3(b.operando,c.ctar1,x.min_cdsti,c.d_valido_al, data_validita_al), valori, c.d_valido_dal, NVL(prezzo,0), b.id_operando , DEC_CTFOR(C.CTFOR), TO_CHAR(cdsti,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(cdces,'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY operando, bis

FactorExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 facts_f_factor.legacy, --4 facts_f_factor.tipo, --5 facts_f_factor.operand, --6 facts_f_factor.saison, --7 facts_f_factor.prog, --8 facts_v_factor.legacy, --9 facts_v_factor.tipo, --10 facts_v_factor.ab, --11 facts_v_factor.bis, --12 facts_v_factor.factor, --13 facts_v_factor.tarifart, --14 facts_v_factor.kondigr, --15 facts_v_factor.prog --16 from facts_key,facts_f_factor,facts_v_factor where facts_key.legacy = facts_f_factor.legacy and facts_v_factor.legacy=facts_key.legacy and facts_f_factor.legacy=facts_v_factor.legacy and facts_f_factor.prog=facts_v_factor.prog order by facts_f_factor.prog
